reviews.review_msg: Dr. J is a great prof who really cares about his students success. It was a pleasure to take a course with him. The course itself is def heavy so I recommend you prepare well and study, use your TA for extra resources and ask questions!

The course itself is pretty difficult due to an intensive amount of information, but what made it less horrible for students was his grading scale where an 80% is already an A-, unlike other inconsiderate professors who normally set 80% or even 81% for a B+. Additionally Dr J is considerate and easy-going, and his accent is just addictive.
Overall, he was a really good prof and his lectures were super engaging. The exams were a little difficult and time crunch, but he would scale the grades accordingly.

Dr. Jaumouille is a great lecturer. His accent is not that hard to decipher, and he compensates for it by talking a little bit slower. He explains things very clearly, and is passionate about the lectures he gives and the topics he teaches. The grading scheme for the class is 3 exams and weekly assignments, which is pretty standard for MBB at SFU.

Professor was professional in the field but not good at explaining and teaching. Sometimes he sounded not confident enough to explain the slides. Slides did not have enough explanations but some of those were on the exams. 

Final exam was changed from non-cumulative to cumulative so it was a bit heavy. MC questions were long (Rmb to spend time)

Dr. Jaumouille delivers his lectures well and they are all recorded so you can review them anytime. Exams are pretty decent with some difficult questions here and there but he scales the grade. Make sure to review learning objectives in his slides, attend tutorials and you should be fine. Overall, I would take another class with him again.

Great professor! Her lectures were engaging while discussing fairly dull content. She quickly answers every question asked in lecture in excellent depth and shows real compassion for her students. Exams are tough but extremely reasonable considering the course content and the marking is fair - would 100% take a course with Dr. Sneddon again.

Dr. Sneddon is probably one of best professors I've ever had. This semester has been pretty depressing and whenever I go to Dr. Sneddon's class I know that it'll be great because she has such a kind and amazing personality. The class was similar to your usual MBB class but the prof made it amazing and I'm so happy I took this class with her.
Best Prof I had this semester, would take every class with Dr. Sneddon if I had the chance
